text: 'alam tar kayf mdd allah alzili min tulue alfajr 'iilaa tulue alshms? walaw sha' lajaealah thabtana mstqrana la tzylh alshms, thuma jaealna alshams elamt yustadall bahwalha ealaa ahwalh, thuma taqallas alzili ysyrana ysyrana, fklma aizdad airtifae alshams aizdad nqsanh. wdhlk min al'adilat ealaa qudrat allah wezmth, wa'anah wahdah almsthq llebadt dun swah
